                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/PKbeDeu5Wbk/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">
                </div>
                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Founding Interns of League of Legends</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-slider-nav__slide">
                <div class="c-slider-nav__thumb">
                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/N44R8c_F2lI/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">
                </div>
                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Definitely (Not) Rivals | Riot Games documentary</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-slider-nav__slide">
                <div class="c-slider-nav__thumb">
                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/l8ssa4YYfrg/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">
                </div>
                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Interns Interviewing Interns</span>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>

    <h1 class="c-heading">
        Level up @ Riot
    </h1>

    <hr class="c-rule">

    <p class="u-text-center">
        We’re helping players connect their passions to careers in gaming. Disciplines range from Game Design to Finance, Data Science to Art, Engineering to Brand Management and all that’s inbetween. Our university programs include internships for undergraduates and graduates, talks we give on campuses around the globe, graduate research projects we conduct in the winter, and classroom takeovers.
    </p>

    <div class="o-spacer"></div>

    <section class="o-section-bg">
        <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--left c-heading--light">Work Hard, Play Hard</h2>
        <p>
            That’s how many interns describe their time at Riot, and we think that’s pretty accurate. Interns roost in most Riot offices around the world, from LAX to Berlin, where they tackle tough problems while getting to know each other over rounds of League. We believe interns deserve the full-time Rioter treatment-- the opportunity to take on meaningful problems impacting over 70 million players rather than fetching coffee.
        </p>

        <div class="o-spacer"></div>

        <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/internship-info" class="c-button">Internship Information
            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 25 25" class="c-button__icon c-icon c-icon--arrow">
                <title>play-arrow</title>
                <circle class="a" cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="12.5"/>
                <path class="b" d="M18 13l-9 5V8z"/>
            </svg>
        </a>
    </section>

    <section class="o-section">

        <header class="o-section__header">
            <span class="o-section__top-text">Fun Fact #127</span>
            <h2 class="c-heading">All Random All Math</h2>
        </header>

        <div class="c-math-box clearfix">
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 18 24" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>file</title>
                        <path d="M17.5 23.5H.5V.5h11l6 6v17z"/>
                        <path d="M11.5.5v6h6M4.5 7.5H9M4.5 10.5h9M4.5 13.5h9M4.5 16.5h9M4.5 19.5h9"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">6K</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Applications received</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 23 23" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>phone</title>
                        <path d="M8.59 6.9a2.31 2.31 0 0 0 0-3.27L6.13 1.18a2.31 2.31 0 0 0-3.27 0L1.52 2.52a3.46 3.46 0 0 0-.44 4.37 53.79 53.79 0 0 0 15 15 3.47 3.47 0 0 0 4.37-.44l1.35-1.35a2.31 2.31 0 0 0 0-3.27l-2.45-2.45a2.31 2.31 0 0 0-3.27 0l-.82.82a54.85 54.85 0 0 1-7.49-7.48z"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">300</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Initial phone screens</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>person</title>
                        <path d="M12 23.5h11.5a10.14 10.14 0 0 0-1-4.06c-.75-1.49-4-2.5-8-4v-3a3.75 3.75 0 0 0 1.5-3c.5 0 1-2 0-2.5 0-.3 1.34-2.8 1-4.5-.5-2.5-7.5-2.5-8-.5-3 0-1 4.59-1 5-1 .5-.5 2.5 0 2.5a3.75 3.75 0 0 0 1.5 3v3c-4 1.5-7.25 2.51-8 4a10.14 10.14 0 0 0-1 4.06z"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">0.6%</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Applicants accepted</span>
            </div>
        </div>

    </section>

</div>

<div class="o-container o-container--full clearfix">

    <div class="o-grid o-grid--flex">

        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-1">
                <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--light c-heading--spacer">Graduate Winter Project</h2>
                <hr class="c-rule">
                <p class="u-text-center">Our Graduate Winter Project invites a select number of graduate students to a Riot office to gain experience developing their business and analytical skills. It's a glimpse into the working life at Riot, so top students know what they'd be signing up for.</p>
                <p class="u-text-center">Each student team takes on the subject of a specific case study: challenging situations digging into key business decisions we face as a growing company. The small five- or six-person team learns our strategies and how we've applied them to similar problems. The objective and deliverables are set by Rioters who identify unique problem spaces for students to explore.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-2 u-text-center">
                <div class="o-section-bg__logo c-logo c-logo--ulol">
                    uLoL
                </div>
                <p><strong>More than just a game.</strong></p>
                <p class="u-text-center">University League of Legends (ULoL) is a student-led network of League of Legends players on college campuses across the U.S. and Canada. Whether you’re new to League or a seasoned Rift vet, ULoL is your place to connect with other League players, learn how and why they play, and see what they're up to when afk.</p>
                <a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C5eqyn_g460?autoplay=1" class="c-image-thumb js-fancybox fancybox.iframe">
                    <img src="sites/all/modules/custom/riot/university_programs/img/ulol-thumb.jpg" alt="" class="c-image-thumb__image">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 25 25" class="c-image-thumb__icon c-icon c-icon--arrow">
                        <title>play-arrow</title>
                        <circle class="a" cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="12.5"/>
                        <path class="b" d="M18 13l-9 5V8z"/>
                    </svg>
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>

</div>

</div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div></section>

t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                    small-24

class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Informática</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 6 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/noticias/noticia/2016/09/mouse-gamer-o-que-levar-em-consideracao-antes-de-comprar.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Mouse gamer: o que levar em consideração antes de comprar</p></div></div><div <script async src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js"></script><script>
var altura_leia_mais = 400;
</script><div id="widget-descricao-entidade" class="widget-descricao-entidade box primary"><article itemprop="description"><h2 class="titulo-descricao sem-titulo-especifico">Descrição</h2><div class="corpo-descricao"><p>O mouse &eacute; um perif&eacute;rico para notebook e computador para auxiliar no uso das m&aacute;quinas. Ele pode ser gamer, como o Abyssus, da Razer, e o Corsair, &oacute;ptico, wireless, bluetooth, usb ou com macro. As principais marcas s&atilde;o Microsoft, Genius, Multilaser. Para melhorar a usabilidade, &eacute; indicado uso de mouse pad.</p></div></article><div class="container-leia-mais"><a class="leia-mais gui-color-primary-link cor-produto" href="#">LEIA MAIS</a></div></div></div><div class="areatemplate-direita

p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="areatemplate-topo row-full-width"></div><div class="row"><div class="small-24 column areatemplate-showtime"></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio

  </script>
  <script id="composition_state" nonce="jnwERv0V6GRyUUv266mXhA==">
    !function(){function t(t){t.target.setAttribute("data-in-composition","true")}function n(t){t.target.removeAttribute("data-in-composition")}document.addEventListener&&(document.addEventListener("compositionstart",t,!1),document.addEventListener("compositionend",n,!1))}();
  </script>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://abs.twimg.com/a/1490316554/css/t1/twitter_core.bundle.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://abs.twimg.com/a/1490316554/css/t1/twitter_more_1.bundle.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://abs.twimg.com/a/1490316554/css/t1/twitter_more_2.bundle.css">

  <input type="hidden" value="c3dcd480fb86d81c51130c09fa301fe9fb6a5cee" name="authenticity_token">
</form>

              <hr>
              <div class="signup SignupForm">
                <div class="SignupForm-header">New to Twitter?</div>
                <a href="https://twitter.com/signup" role="button" class="SignupForm-submit u-block u-textCenter js-signup btn"
                  data-component="signup_callout"
                  data-element="dropdown"
                  >Sign up
                </a>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>



        <div id="page-outer">
          <div id="page-container" class="AppContent wrapper wrapper-login">
              
            <div class="page-canvas">

  <div class="signin-wrapper" data-login-message="">
    <h1>Log in to Twitter</h1>
    <form action="https://twitter.com/sessions" class="t1-form clearfix signin js-signin" method="post">

      class="js-username-field email-input js-initial-focus"

      placeholder="Phone, email or username"
    />

     <div id="geo-disabled-dropdown">
      <div tabindex="-1">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <span class="caret-outer"></span>
    <span class="caret-inner"></span>
  </div>
  <ul>
    <li class="geo-not-enabled-yet">
      <h2>Add a location to your Tweets</h2>
      <p>
        When you tweet with a location, Twitter stores that location.&#32;
        You can switch location on/off before each Tweet and always have the option to delete your location history.
        <a href="http://support.twitter.com/forums/26810/entries/78525" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a>
      </p>
      <div>
        <button type="button" class="geo-turn-on btn primary-btn">Turn location on</button>
        <button type="button" class="geo-not-now btn-link">Not now</button>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

    </div>

  <div id="geo-enabled-dropdown">
    <div tabindex="-1">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <span class="caret-outer"></span>
    <span class="caret-inner"></span>
  </div>

    </div>

      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title">Create a new list</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
        
<div class="list-editor">
  <div class="field">
    <label class="t1-label" for="list-name">List name</label>
    <input id="list-name" type="text" class="text" name="name" value="" />
  </div>
  <hr/>

  <div class="field">
    <label class="t1-label" for="list-description">Description</label>
    <textarea id="list-description" name="description"></textarea>
    <span class="help-text">Under 100 characters, optional</span>
  </div>
  <hr/>

  <fieldset class="field">
    <legend class="t1-legend">Privacy</legend>
    <div class="options">
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-public-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-public-radio" value="public" checked="checked"  />
        <b>Public</b> &middot; Anyone can follow this list
      </label>
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-private-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-private-radio" value="private"  />
        <b>Private</b> &middot; Only you can access this list
      </label>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
  <hr/>

  <div class="list-editor-save">
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary update-list-button" data-list-id="">Save list</button>
  </div>

</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
